title: find
description: Find an element based on display text or a selector, then optionally interact with it.

anyOf.title: Find element (simple)
anyOf.description: Identifier for the element to find. Can be a selector, element text, ARIA name, ID, or test ID.

elementText.description: Display text of the element to find. If combined with other element finding fields, the element must match all specified criteria.

selector.description: Selector of the element to find. If combined with other element finding fields, the element must match all specified criteria.

elementId.description: ID attribute of the element to find. Supports exact match or regex pattern using /pattern/ syntax.

elementTestId.description: data-testid attribute of the element to find. Supports exact match or regex pattern using /pattern/ syntax.

elementClass.description: Class or array of classes that the element must have. Each class supports exact match or regex pattern using /pattern/ syntax. Element must have all specified classes.

elementAttribute.description: Object of attribute key-value pairs that the element must have. Values can be strings (supporting /pattern/ regex), numbers, or booleans. Boolean true matches attribute presence, false matches absence.

elementAria.description: Computed accessible name of the element per ARIA specification. Supports exact match or regex pattern using /pattern/ syntax.

timeout.description: Max duration in milliseconds to wait for the element to exist.

moveTo.description: Move to the element. If the element isn't visible, it's scrolled into view.

anyOf.title: Click element (simple)
anyOf.description: Identifier for the element to click. Can be a selector, element text, ARIA name, ID, or test ID.

elementText.description: Display text of the element to click. If combined with other element finding fields, the element must match all specified criteria.

selector.description: Selector of the element to click. If combined with other element finding fields, the element must match all specified criteria.

elementId.description: ID attribute of the element to click. Supports exact match or regex pattern using /pattern/ syntax.

elementTestId.description: data-testid attribute of the element to click. Supports exact match or regex pattern using /pattern/ syntax.

elementClass.description: Class or array of classes that the element must have. Each class supports exact match or regex pattern using /pattern/ syntax. Element must have all specified classes.

elementAttribute.description: Object of attribute key-value pairs that the element must have. Values can be strings (supporting /pattern/ regex), numbers, or booleans. Boolean true matches attribute presence, false matches absence.

elementAria.description: Computed accessible name of the element per ARIA specification. Supports exact match or regex pattern using /pattern/ syntax.

string.title: Click element (simple)
string.description: Identifier for the element to click. Can be a selector, element text, ARIA name, ID, or test ID.

elementText.description: Display text of the element to click. If combined with other element finding fields, the element must match all specified criteria.

selector.description: Selector of the element to click. If combined with other element finding fields, the element must match all specified criteria.

elementId.description: ID attribute of the element to click. Supports exact match or regex pattern using /pattern/ syntax.

elementTestId.description: data-testid attribute of the element to click. Supports exact match or regex pattern using /pattern/ syntax.

elementClass.description: Class or array of classes that the element must have. Each class supports exact match or regex pattern using /pattern/ syntax. Element must have all specified classes.

elementAttribute.description: Object of attribute key-value pairs that the element must have. Values can be strings (supporting /pattern/ regex), numbers, or booleans. Boolean true matches attribute presence, false matches absence.

elementAria.description: Computed accessible name of the element per ARIA specification. Supports exact match or regex pattern using /pattern/ syntax.

type.description: Type keys after finding the element. Either a string or an object with a `keys` field as defined in [`type`](type). To type in the element, make the element active with the `click` parameter.

allOf.title: typeKeys
allOf.description: Type keys. To type special keys, begin and end the string with `$` and use the special key's keyword. For example, to type the Escape key, enter `$ESCAPE$`.

inputDelay.description: Delay in milliseconds between each key press during a recording

selector.description: Selector for the element to type into. If not specified, the typing occurs in the active element.

elementText.description: Display text of the element to type into. If combined with other element finding fields, the element must match all specified criteria.

elementId.description: ID attribute of the element to find. Supports exact match or regex pattern using /pattern/ syntax.

elementTestId.description: data-testid attribute of the element to find. Supports exact match or regex pattern using /pattern/ syntax.

elementClass.description: Class or array of classes that the element must have. Each class supports exact match or regex pattern using /pattern/ syntax. Element must have all specified classes.

elementAttribute.description: Object of attribute key-value pairs that the element must have. Values can be strings (supporting /pattern/ regex), numbers, or booleans. Boolean true matches attribute presence, false matches absence.

elementAria.description: Computed accessible name of the element per ARIA specification. Supports exact match or regex pattern using /pattern/ syntax.
